subject: Baseball
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Griffey, who received a record 99.3 percent of the vote, would be the first player with a Mariners cap on his plaque. Piazza, who got in on his fourth try, is likely to represent the Mets.
snippet: Griffey, who received a record 99.3 percent of the vote, would be the first player with a Mariners cap on his plaque. Piazza, who got in on his fourth try, is likely to represent the Mets.
